1.plot:

2.title: You've Been Warned
2.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Fancy Meeting You Here
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Mommie Dearest, Part I
4.plot: Blanche shares the news that her mother has died and the battle for Mildred's money begins as she tries to keep it from Joey.

5.title: Mommie Dearest, Part II
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Meet Magnolia
6.plot: Magnolia expresses concern about her grandchildren, the intelligence of her son, Jimmy Ray, and wonders about the past and future intentions of her daughter-in-law, Fancy Hicks.

7.title: Caught on Camera: Detective Sanford
7.plot: Detective Grady Sanford grieves over the loss of his partner.

8.title: Meet Sandra Sylvan
8.plot: Good girl Sandra Sylvan is tired of being a wallflower in Proper. She has her set her sights on finding a bad boy that will bring some excitement into her life. She's heard about the big party Joey Sorrento is throwing at Soul & Bones and intends to be there to find a new man. Her strict parents would never approve but, in this town, what the parents don't know seems to be pretty common.

9.title: Caught on Camera - Morris Finkleman
9.plot: Morris Finkleman is one of Proper's few Attorneys and, as a result, often ends up working on projects for both Blanche and Alessandro Sorrento, who aren't always working towards the same agenda. He'll definitely need some help and Proper does need some additional Attorney's. He was caught on camera in his therapy session discussing his concerns with Therapist Susan Black.

10.title: Caught on Camera: Susan Black
10.plot: Therapist Susan Black takes a moment to reflect on Mildred's funeral and the state of mind Blanche may be in with all the stress. She thinks she may have seen someone from Blanche's past at the church.

11.title: Meet Hope Rogers
11.plot: Hope Rogers, Joey's 6th Grade girlfriend and a loyal protector of everything he does, is preparing for tonight's party at Soul & Bones but first she had some thoughts she wanted to share about Mildred's funeral, Claire Walden and Trina Trapnell.

12.title: Mommie Dearest, Part III
12.plot: As Proper grieves the loss of town matriarch Mildred Dean Crawford, Joey and his friends have a get rich party at Soul & Bones, Medio's drug debts finally become due, and lovers and friends are mysteriously unavailable in this nail biting season finale that will change everything for the Sorrento's and the town of Proper forever.

1.title: Meet Sheldon & Shelly
1.plot: Brother and Sister, Sheldon & Shelly Balducci are as opposite as you can imagine - Shelly, a well behaved bad girl always on the prowl for her one true love, is full of surprises. Sheldon, still a student at Proper Middle & High School has bigger plans for his life. Shelly was hoping to make the party at Soul & Bones. Is it possible she hasn't heard about the developments in downtown Proper?

2.title: Frank's True Colors
2.plot: Rev. Frank Holder intends to keep Proper free of sinners and evildoers. One family seems to be the core of his battle of all that is going wrong in Proper. He intends to make sure they answer to a higher being. We wonder how many members of his congregation truly embrace his ideology.

3.title: Meet Miles Barnes
3.plot: Miles Barnes just watched the pregame and the Superbowl. Miles happened to see the Exclusive Interview with Obama during the Superbowl pregame and decided to post his opinion about the Affordable Care Act, aka Obamacare.

4.title: Caught on Camera: Alessandro Sorrento
4.plot: Alessandro Sorrento, as the Patriarch of the Sorrento family, father to Antonio, Medio and Joey, as well as husband to Proper's original woman with a plan, Blanche Crawford Sorrento, seems to be getting hit from many directions and someone may or may not be sabotaging his success. With the developments at Soul & Bones, missing money, and a family causing drama all over town, he isn't sure what he needs to be doing differently but we are confident he'll figure it out...and soon. After all, is crossing the Sorrento's ever really a good idea?

5.title: Meet Michelina
5.plot: Michelina Sorrento hasn't spent as much time in Proper as the rest of her family. Being the daughter of Medio Sorrento, her Mom thought it was best they live elsewhere since the Sorrento family has been filled with so much drama. Lina, as everyone calls her, is missing her cousins and grandparents and is thinking that maybe Proper isn't so bad. She has her sights on becoming a successful Actress one day. Will her family support her dreams or kill her ambition?

6.title: The Mayor
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Meet Olive Tever
7.plot: City Manager Olive Tever frantically tries to reach her sons after an explosion at Soul & Bones Restaurant.

8.title: Inferno: Part I
8.plot: In the aftermath of the explosion and fire at the Sorrento owned Soul & Bones Restaurant, emergency crews and Proper, USA city officials arrive on scene for a rescue and recovery mission of the youth of Proper.

9.title: Meet Sherrie Simmons
9.plot: Sherrie Simmons is one of Proper's better behaved girls. We are glad she is safe but we can only wonder how she will react to the news, especially since her older brother, Jack, is one of Joey's oldest childhood friends.

10.title: Magnolia Hears an Explosion
10.plot: Magnolia heard an explosion in downtown Proper that has really spooked her and she isn't sure what is happening.

11.title: Meet Reba Collier
11.plot: Reba Collier has grown up in the Historic part of Proper her entire life and the Collier family is quite prominent and connected.

12.title: Meet Michael Knights
12.plot: Michael Knights, the younger brother of Joey Sorrento's best friend, Jef Knights, really admires his older brother but wishes he would spend more time him instead of Joey.

13.title: Clancey & Alvin
13.plot: Mayor Clancey Mahue and Dr. Alvin Cameron, the Medical Examiner in Proper, have been friends there entire lives. Tonight they have received a call that will change Proper forever.

14.title: Hope & Erin
14.plot: Hope Rogers and Erin Bodell have been friends through most of their teenage years in Proper. They have both survived the Soul & Bones Explosion. The question is, what kind of traumatic effects will the event have on them over the long run.

15.title: Meet Lizzy Hinsdale
15.plot: Lizzy Hinsdale's world revolves around, well, Lizzy Hinsdale. It appears she has survived the Soul & Bones explosion but with most of her "friends" being involved in this tragedy, you can bet she'll make it "All About Lizzy."

16.title: Inferno: Part II
16.plot: The families and the community of Proper wait to hear news on who has died and who has survived the explosion at the Sorrento owned Soul & Bones.

17.title: News Report #1 with Gayle Hite
17.plot: Gayle Hite has just received word about the explosion and fire in Downtown Proper at Soul & Bones.

18.title: Is My Dad Okay?
18.plot: Victor Moreno, one of the firefighters who has responded to the Soul & Bones explosion, had to leave quickly and left his daughter Aria, and niece, Sarah Campbell, alone.

19.title: Frank Holder's Surprise
19.plot: Frank Holder (Alan R. Meyer), Proper's virulent Minister, is prepping with Youth Minister Tim Hill (Stephen Harr) for the coming week's lesson when he receives a call from Guy Walden regarding the explosion at Soul & Bones.

20.title: Brothers & Sisters
20.plot: As news spreads throughout Proper about the Soul & Bones explosion and tragedy, Michael Knights, younger brother of Jef Knights, receives a phone call from his cousin, Police Chief Terence Dalton, about the development.

21.title: Meet Samantha Brightman
21.plot: Samantha Brightmanis truly concerned about the welfare of her childhood friend Joey and the fact that he is missing, as well as her other friend, Nicki Griffin.

22.title: News Report #2 with Gayle Hite
22.plot: Proper Manors Reporter Gayle Hite reports live from Proper General Hospital with updates about the Soul & Bones tragedy as families await news in nearby waiting rooms.

23.title: Margot's Worst Nightmare
23.plot: Margot (Carolyn Crow Koskan) has heard news about the Soul & Bones explosion and has been worried about her nephews - knowing a party was happening tonight.

24.title: Nigel & Jedidiah Celebrate
24.plot: Nigel Holmes (Brandon Christian) and Jedidiah Hall (Rick Miller) are kicking back at Proper's Hole In The Wall Bar - celebrating that they successfully beat Medio Sorrento and left him for dead.

25.title: A Mother's Love
25.plot: Leona Hall (Melissa Fife), mother of Torrey & Tommy Hall, has been stoic all night about the developments in Proper and the Soul & Bones Explosion. .

26.title: The Inferno, Part III
26.plot: In this heartbreaking finale of the three part Episode "Inferno," we finally find out who has died in the Soul & Bones explosion, as well as the names of some of those who are missing and possibly presumed dead.

27.title: Gayle Seeks a Statement
27.plot: Gayle Hite as arrived at Proper General Hospital and is looking for answers about the Soul & Bones tragedy.

28.title: Breaking News - Gayle Interviews City Leaders
28.plot: Local News Reporter Gayle Hite has been working hard all night in Proper to get additional details regarding the Soul & Bones Explosion.

29.title: Lizzy Seeks Comfort
29.plot: Lizzy Hinsdale is a unique creature and while she may be in shock, it seems she is looking for comfort from Proper's notoriously cold and to the point Frederick Christopherson.

30.title: Aftermath, Part I
30.plot: A somber feeling of grief and loss is evident as the town of Proper begins to wake up and realize the extent of the tragedy that has struck Soul and Bones.

31.title: Aftermath, Part II
31.plot: The community begins to grapple with the reality of the deaths from the Soul and Bones explosion, as well as wondering about those that are missing.

32.title: Sherrie Simmons Can't Sleep
32.plot: Sherrie still can't sleep as she worries about what might have been and what is to come.

33.title: Weston's Girls
33.plot: Deputy Bobby Weston (Jason K. Wixom) has a lot on his mind. Being related to of one of Proper's most notoriously mentally unstable families has made it a challenge for him to fit into the community.

34.title: Meet Tim Hill
34.plot: Tim Hill (Stephen Harr) is a part of the youth ministry team at Rev. Frank Holder's church in Proper.

35.title: Like Family
35.plot: During the Soul and Bones Explosion Nicki Griffin (Morgan Mabey) kept returning to the fire to rescue additional classmates and friends. She was critically injured in the process and now everyone is on standby to find out how she is doing.

36.title: The Aftermath, Part III
36.plot: In the final part of The Aftermath Trilogy, we continue to deal with the residents of Proper, USA as they adjust to life without those who have died and are missing or presumed dead.

37.title: Grief Returns Home, Part I
37.plot: The town of Proper, USA begins to get back to business as they prepare for a memorial for the victims of the Soul and Bones explosion.

38.title: Grief Comes Home, Part II
38.plot: Word has spread to all the residents of Proper, USA about the tragedy at Soul and Bones and the official word on the dead and missing has been leaked to everyone.

39.title: Grief Comes Home, Part III
39.plot: The residents of Proper finally begin exploring exactly what happened at Soul and Bones and determines the direction the community must take to have some questions answered.

40.title: In Memorium, Part I
40.plot: Proper begins to bury the dead. Rorey makes a decision about his future. Detectives Maki and Sanford begin working with Law Enforcement. Joey continues to recover. Blanche becomes increasingly impatient.

41.title: In Memorium, Part II
41.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

42.title: In Memorium, Part III
42.plot: It's time to honor those who perished in the Soul and Bones fire. Magnolia arrives in town to console Fancy. Rorey seeks justice for whoever is responsible for his brother's death. The Bodell's marriage slips into a slippery place.

43.title: In Memorium, Part IV
43.plot:

44.title: Halloween Special: Plan 9.6 from Outer Space

45.title: In Memorium, Part V

46.title: Thanksgiving: Homeless for the Holidays
46.plot:
Know what this is about?

47.title: Christmas Special: Christmas Party All the Time
47.plot: Miles Barnes is forced to throw contractually-obligated Holiday party.

48.title: Proper Manors: New Years Eve Special: "The Future's So Bright"
48.plot: The youth of Proper decide to have a party to ring in the New Year. The adults decide to do the same.

49.title: We Gotta Wear Lamp Shades
49.plot:
Know what this is about?

50.title: Proper Manors: Valentine's Day Special
50.plot:
Know what this is about?

51.title: A Thorne by Your Side
51.plot: Thorne Rose, overcome with emotion and gratitude, is the father of Victoria and Trinity Rose who are best friends with Nicki Griffin, who is in critical condition after the explosion.

52.title: Pray for the Sorrentos
52.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

53.title: The Search, Part I
53.plot: Proper's Police along with Detectives Grady and Maki continue to look for answers related to the Soul and Bones Explosion.Rorey adjusts to life in Proper.

54.title: The Search, Part II
54.plot: Police get closer to discovering what has happened to Michelle Summerfield. Crazy Jane and Joey grow closer. Blanche appears to get what she wants. Vedetta, Holly and Miles begin pursuing their individual agendas.

55.title: Miss. Proper Etiquette: Lizzy Hinsdale
55.plot: As most of the young women in Proper, USA begin to prepare for the Miss. Proper Etiquette Pageant, Lizzy Hinsdale is the first one to arrive with her video blog for the community about why she should be Miss Proper Etiquette.

56.title: Miss.Proper Etiquette: Breanna Summerfield
56.plot: Breanna Summerfield decides to also run for the title. In her video blog for the community , she lets people know why she should be Miss. Proper Etiquette.

57.title: Miss. Proper Etiquette: Sarah Campbell
57.plot: One of Proper's most kind girls, Sarah Campbell, also has decided to run for the title. In her video blog for the community, she lets people know why she should be Miss. Proper Etiquette.

58.title: The Search, Part III
58.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

59.title: A Kosher Easter
59.plot: In this delayed Easter special, we learn that Proper, USA is a diverse community with different holiday perspectives.

60.title: Miss. Proper Etiquette: Samantha Brightman
60.plot: We continue to prepare for the Miss. Proper Etiquette Pageant in Proper, USA. Samantha Brightman, the daughter of Matt and Cynthia Brightman, has now thrown her video introduction into the mix.

61.title: The Return, Part I
61.plot: Breanna struggles to understand how her family unit will ever be the same, Jane and Joey prepare to say good-bye to one another, the city leaders of Proper struggle to get life back to normal.

62.title: Miss. Proper Etiquette: Erin Bodell
62.plot: Erin Bodell is poised to compete in the Miss. Proper Etiquette pageant.

63.title: The Return, Part II
63.plot: Rev. Frank Holder demands some changes. Det. Sanford continues to dig for answers. Holly and Nigel try to blackmail Blanche. Joey leaves Crazy Jane.

64.title: Miss. Proper Etiquette: Ariel Tucker
64.plot: Ariel Tucker isn't like the other girls in town and she isn't afraid to speak her true thoughts. In her Miss. Proper Etiquette Video Blog, she lets you know why she should be the next Miss. Proper Etiquette.

65.title: Miss. Proper Etiquette: Hannah Brightman
65.plot: Hannah Brightman, daughter of Jackson Brightman, wants to win the crown.

66.title: Miss. Proper Etiquette: Sherrie Simmons
66.plot: As a true lover of dance and the arts, with a strong feminist perspective, Sherrie Simmons is running for the title of Miss. Proper Etiquette.

67.title: Miss. Proper Etiquette: Hillary Campbell
67.plot: Get to know Hillary Campbell a little bit better in her Miss. Proper Etiquette blog.

68.title: Miss. Proper Etiquette: Ginger Hines
68.plot: Ginger Hines is focused on doing what's best for the community and you'll learn more about her and the quest for the crown in her MIss. Proper Etiquette Blog.

69.title: The Return, Part III
69.plot: A prominent youth remains missing, another returns home to disastrous news and someone is sent to their grave.

70.title: Miss Proper Etiquette: Trinity Stakes Her Claim
70.plot: Trinity Rose, a 6 time runner-up for Miss. Proper Etiquette,is training a portion of the girls competing for the title this year.

1.title: Re-Built This City, Part I
1.plot: The Season 3 Premiere of Proper Manors picks up with the residents in a special first portion of a five-part episode six months after Season 2 has ended.

2.title: Re-Built This City, Part II
2.plot: As the Sorrento's continue with the grand opening of Big Z, we are updated on some of the latest developments in the community.

3.title: Re-Built This City, Part III
3.plot: As the Grand Opening of Big Z continues, Joey's childhood best friend, Rock Marshall, resurfaces, connecting on a deeper level with the Sorrento's, Vedetta and Maria # 2 prepare to face off.

4.title: Rebuilt This City, Part IV
4.plot: Relationships and alliances continue to be tested and formed. The media continues to seek ways to exploit the Soul and Bones tragedy. The Brightman and Sorrento families hunker down for their own battles.

5.title: Re-Built This City, Part V
5.plot: In this final episode of our 5 part Season 2 opener, drugs, affairs and divorce come into play as Proper's residents continue to plan their next steps.

6.title: A Time for Answers
6.plot: Anjelica Sorrento worries about her father, while Maria Sorrento does the same. Giovanna doesn't have the answers. Big Jim and Chief Dalton discuss theories on the Soul and Bone tragedy. Erin Bodell drops a bombshell.

7.title: A Little Introspection
7.plot: Detective Grady senses the dangers of the Costanza Organization are reaching into Proper. Residents reflect on their choices and relationships. Alessandro experiences a reunion of sorts with his relatives who are in prison.

8.title: Modern Problems
8.plot: Rain and Mick find out from an unlikely source that their companies are having some labor issues. Crazy Jane continues finding her way in Proper. The youth of Proper discuss equality and fairness.

9.title: Reaching Out
9.plot: Det. Sanford continues to grieve. Proper looks towards the future with plans for a new community center. Nikki Griffin goes home among numerous medical scandals in town. Therapist A.C. Pasolini arrives.

10.title: Rumors & Social Clubs
10.plot: Joey Sorrento returns to the show. Vendetta Caprese Sorrento and Angelica Sorrento come to blows over Antonio Sorrento. Magnolia and Margot are arrested. Diana Critch worries about her daughter The youth of Proper catch up..

11.title: Sisters of the Moon
11.plot: A stranger begins to seduce Vedetta. Nikki, still in a coma, arrives home. Mama visits Margot in her new shop. Sloan Drust, a local Wiccan, mentors Regan Weston. Alessandro Sorrento visits his granddaughter, Anjelica Sorrento, in prison.

12.title: So Far Away
12.plot: Joey checks in from Paris. Alessandro and Vedetta deliver threaten Anjelica. Alvin retires and passes his wisdom to Phil Robinson. Molly warns Erin Bodell that Trina is reportedly pregnant. Alessandro and Miles stop by the shelter.

13.title: Come Away with Me
13.plot: Joey continues his journey through Italy. Alessandro's plan for revenge deepens. Erin looks for her pregnancy to succeed and finds solace with Crazy Jane. Bettie invites Tamera to open up. Anna and Blaine have a public meltdown.

14.title: Orchestrated Maneuvers in the Dark

26.title: Going Home, Part II
26.plot: Proper prepares to fill some city vacancies for the community. As the applicants show up to debate, a scandal is revealed.

-1.title: Proper Manors: ALS Ice Bucket Challenge
-1.plot: The cast of Proper Manors gets wet for the ALS Challenge.

locations: Soul & Bones Restaurant, Ogden, Utah, USA
Millennial Falls Wedding and Reception Center, Draper, Utah, USA

Haunted Hollow, West Haven, Utah, USA
imdb.plot outline: Joey and his friends have graduated from high school in the small town of Proper, USA. Shila Hicks has arrived in town, followed by her mother Fancy Hicks. Mildred Dean Crawford is ailing and her daughter, Blanche Crawford Sorrento, has a plan. Someone is missing in Proper. Someone is watching the youth of Proper.
imdb.title: Proper Manors
plot: _Proper Manors_ (qv) is a soap opera about a group of recently graduated teenagers in the small town of Proper, USA. They begin to discover that they are all merely pawns in the games that the adults of Proper play.::David Jannone

Joey and his friends have graduated from high school in the small town of Proper, USA. Shila Hicks has arrived in town, followed by her mother Fancy Hicks. Mildred Dean Crawford is ailing and her daughter, Blanche Crawford Sorrento, has a plan. Someone is missing in Proper. Someone is watching the youth of Proper.::David Jannone
